title: Brothers Traded Moleskin Pants as an Annual Christmas Gift
subtitle: For twenty-five years, two brothers-in-law traded the same pants back and forth between them as a Christmas gift, each time finding more inventive ways to wrap them.
author: Snopes Staff
vclaim: For twenty-five years, two brothers-in-law traded the same pants back and forth between them as a Christmas gift, each time finding more inventive ways to wrap them.
